name: Arrow VS Snake
description:
Arrow VS Snake，the ultimate challenge is Here！
Shoot the Arrow to the moving snake！
Break the Snake and unlock new snake and arrow！
Each 4 stage is more difficult and more bonus！
Beat the snake and get the bonus！

Be careful to not hit the Block at the Snake. Time your actions, target carefully and become the master of Snake Killer!

Can you beat all the Snakes？
